# The `LLLazyJIT` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An extended version of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/lljit">LLJIT</a> that supports lazy function-at-a-time compilation of LLVM IR. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::orc::LLLazyJIT</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

An extended version of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/lljit">LLJIT</a> that supports lazy function-at-a-time compilation of LLVM IR.
